summary:
1. How does Tony have a mask to talk to? His armour in Infinity War was nano tech coming out of the thingy on his chest.
2. Old...
body:
1. How does Tony have a mask to talk to? His armour in Infinity War was nano tech coming out of the thingy on his chest.

2. Old Man Thanos had a farm, e, i, e, i, oooo.

3. Ronin was not a surprise.

4. Ant Man showing up is not a surprise, but how did he escape? Is it true that Scott is in the background of one of the scenes in the first Captain Marvel trailer?

5. Are Cap and Natasha (“this is going to work”) sitting in a time ship of some kind? Since that’s the big theory … that it’s not just the leftover Avengers plus Carol/Scott/Ronin, but that the timeline has to change to prevent The Snap in the first place.

reblog.comment:

4. Ant Man showing up is not a surprise, but how did he escape? Is it true that Scott is in the background of one of the scenes in the first Captain Marvel trailer?

5. Are Cap and Natasha (“this is going to work”) sitting in a time ship of some kind? Since that’s the big theory … that it’s not just the leftover Avengers plus Carol/Scott/Ronin, but that the timeline has to change to prevent The Snap in the first place.

1. How does Tony have a mask to talk to? His armour in Infinity War was nano tech coming out of the thingy on his chest.

2. Old Man Thanos had a farm, e, i, e, i, oooo.

3. Ronin was not a surprise.

4. Ant Man showing up is not a surprise, but how did he escape? Is it true that Scott is in the background of one of the scenes in the first Captain Marvel trailer?

5. Are Cap and Natasha (“this is going to work”) sitting in a time ship of some kind? Since that’s the big theory … that it’s not just the leftover Avengers plus Carol/Scott/Ronin, but that the timeline has to change to prevent The Snap in the first place.

1. How does Tony have a mask to talk to? His armour in Infinity War was nano tech coming out of the thingy on his chest.

2. Old Man Thanos had a farm, e, i, e, i, oooo.

3. Ronin was not a surprise.

4. Ant Man showing up is not a surprise, but how did he escape? Is it true that Scott is in the background of one of the scenes in the first Captain Marvel trailer?

5. Are Cap and Natasha (“this is going to work”) sitting in a time ship of some kind? Since that’s the big theory … that it’s not just the leftover Avengers plus Carol/Scott/Ronin, but that the timeline has to change to prevent The Snap in the first place.

summary: I know that gravity cannot ground me. That physics cannot bind me. That there is no attack I cannot deflect. No energy I cannot...
caption:
I know that gravity cannot ground me. That physics cannot bind me. That there is no attack I cannot deflect. No energy I cannot hold. That I am undefeatable. The last dream of a lost planet. My own force of nature. That I am power itself. 

-Carol Danvers, The Mighty Captain Marvel #3

reblog.comment:
I know that gravity cannot ground me. That physics cannot bind me. That there is no attack I cannot deflect. No energy I cannot hold. That I am undefeatable. The last dream of a lost planet. My own force of nature. That I am power itself. 

-Carol Danvers, The Mighty Captain Marvel #3

blog.name: bad-luck-katie
blog.description:
Katie|she/her|19|ace|
I reblog fandom stuff (Undertale/Deltarune, Steven Universe, She Ra, Percy Jackson, and more), LGBTQ+ stuff, some US politics, and whatever else I feel like. Sometimes I post my art.
I'd prefer you not interact if you are in any way racist, misogynistic, or queerphobic/LGBTphobic (includes TERFs, transmeds/truscum, exclusionists, etc).

blog.name: mrdaps
blog.title: Mr. DAPs
blog.description:
Hi there!

I am Mr. DAPs, that guy with the hat that walks around Disneyland. I will mainly be posting some pictures that I have taken that I particularly like here but will occasionally post some other things.

You can read some of my other posts at any or all of the links below:

Blog: mrdaps.com
Website: dapsmagic.com
Twitter: twitter.com/mrdaps
Facebook: facebook.com/misterdaps

Please feel free to add me on any or all of the above links. I look forward to chatting with you and seeing you in the park!

Make it a GREAT day!

-Mr. DAPs

summary: Brie Larson was in Brazil this week representing Marvel Studios’ Captain Marvel at Brazil’s Comic Con Experience. At Brazil...
body:
Brie Larson was in Brazil this week representing Marvel Studios’ Captain Marvel at Brazil’s Comic Con Experience. At Brazil CCXP, she participated about the movie that will be coming to theaters on March 8, 2019. The event takes place in Sao Palo, Brazil.

Brie Larson stars in Captain Marvel that is the next Marvel Cinematic Film to be released ahead of Avengers: Endgame. Both movies received trailers this last week that has the Marvel fan community buzzing.

  • Marvel Studios Releases First Trailer for Avengers: Endgame
  • Marvel Releases Captain Marvel Trailer During Monday Night Football
Brie Larson Represents Marvel Studios’ CAPTAIN MARVEL at Brazil Comic Con Experience Brie Larson was in Brazil this week representing Marvel Studios’ Captain Marvel at Brazil’s Comic Con Experience.

summary: EPISODE 165: The GAME AWARDS RECAP  We are back with our recap of what could have been the most Entertaining event in gaming for...
caption:
EPISODE 165: The GAME AWARDS RECAP 

We are back with our recap of what could have been the most Entertaining event in gaming for 2018.

Find out our thoughts on this year’s GAME AWARD including the bombshell world premiere reveals, moments and award winners.

PLUS: We talk about the new trailers of CAPTAIN MARVEL, AVENGERS: ENDGAME and much more.

All on this edition of A.C.M.G presents TALK TIME LIVE!

summary: Captain Marvel, Endgame, And a Year-End Review: Podcast #98
title: Captain Marvel, Endgame, And a Year-End Review: Podcast #98
excerpt: So much has happened, and so much is still coming.
description:
It’s been a busy week in the MCU, so we jump right in to the biggest of the news, break down our feelings on the new trailers, and take a look back on 2018 and all of the greatness that Marvel provided over the past year.

TIME STAMPS
0:00- It is early in the morning and we are pretending to be peppy.

NEWS
2:55 – Shang Chi in development
10:10 – Black Panther Golden Globe and Grammy nominations

TRAILERS
14:18 – Captain Marvel
34:12 –  Avengers: Endgame

MAIN CONVERSATION
1:01:17 – End of the Year Wrap-up!

MAILBAG
1:24:21 – Did Daredevil really get cancelled mid-recording?

blog.name: peter-i-got-homework-parker
blog.title: "ahh this is nice"
blog.description: Alina(21) Hufflepuff from germany i post marvel+actors, stranger things and sometimes Uncharted or Disney...and i love tom holland... my headcanons

summary: Which trailer did you like more:  Captain Marvel or Endgame?
question: Which trailer did you like more:  Captain Marvel or Endgame?
answer:
Oh that’s a tough one… Mhh okay i waited… I mean we all waited for the Endgame trailer soo long and i mean it was pretty good but it doesn’t tell us that much and what it told us was pain and angst and too much emotion.. But the captain marvel trailer showed us how bad ass carol danvers and that she will (probably) will end this war… And how powerful she is… So it basically gives us hope after infinity war..

I really can’t decide… Because the captain marvel trailer gives us hope and just a few days later the Endgame trailer crashed my feelings again like the end of infinity war….

But you sweet anon ask me a question and you deserve an answer so i would say i liked captain marvel a bit more because i am really excited to she her in action… But it’s just a bit because i am also really excited to see Endgame but i am also afraid to actually see Endgame…. I hope you understand what I mean
